actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement, the 100th anniversary of the return of the Unknown Solider, and the 100th anniversary of the Tomb of the Unknown Solider.

summary.text: This resolution recognizes the 100th anniversary of the signing of the Armistice Treaty, which brought an end to World War I, and recognizes those who served in the U.S. Armed Forces during the war.

titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th anniversary of the Armistice Agreement, the 100th anniversary of the return of the Unknown Solider, and the 100th anniversary of the Tomb of the Unknown Solider.
